page.title: 03The M42
page.content: The M42 is the newest motorway in Britian. This motorway links up the M5 to the M1. Throuhout the village of Rowney Green,a very remote village thre are mixed feelings about the motorway. Many think the Motorway will have no or little effect on life in the village. One man we interviewed said he was on the committee to divert the Motorway. He was very "anti" the motorway because of many reasons. These are 2 of them, its has ruined the scenery, and it has caused a rift in village others say that the village will not be afected either way and some say it is the key to the future. A majority prefer the motorway.
